name: Corn and Avocado Salad
author: Mary
summary: A wonderful corn salad, savory and fresh-tasting. This recipe is fabulous with silver queen corn in the summer, but is also great with yellow sweet corn all year long!
ingredients: 4 ears  sweet corn, cut off the cob
⅔ cup red wine and vinegar salad dressing
directions: Saute bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium high heat until evenly brown
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, red bell pepper, green onions and corn, and mix together
Carefully stir in the cubed avocado
In a separate small bowl, whisk together the red wine and vinegar dressing, the blue cheese dressing, and the honey
Pour the dressing mixture over the salad and toss
Add bacon just before serving to keep it crunchy
